content:
Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to craft a light_blue_dye and a light_blue_bed. I can use the blue_orchid in slot 28 to make the dye, so I will move it to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have made the dye, I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a light blue bed, I need to place a white bed in the center of the crafting grid, and then dye it with light blue dye. The white bed is located in slot 17, but there is already a quartz slab in slot 5 (the center slot), so I will first need to move the light blue dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can move the white bed from slot 17 to slot 2, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_blue_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 14, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the light blue bed by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
